lead_paragraph: Several bartenders in Milan have taken to creating drinks, like the Surfer’s Den’s Ape Vigorosa, inspired by the freewheeling Futurist movement.
snippet: Several bartenders in Milan have taken to creating drinks, like the Surfer’s Den’s Ape Vigorosa, inspired by the freewheeling Futurist movement.

headline.main: In Milan, a New Spin on a Century-Old Cocktail
